$HYPE  is sitting where conviction gets tested, not built. Failed bounces, strong participation, and tight reactions usually precede sharper outcomes. MEXC‚Äôs zero fee campaign allows more attempts and longer presence while waiting for that resolution.

Hyperliquid faces scrutiny after a former employee was linked to shorting the $HYPE  token. The team has banned all staff from trading $HYPE  derivatives and enforces strict insider trading rules. Despite a 37.4 million token burn and $1.65M daily buybacks from revenue, $HYPE  price remains down amid large whale liquidations.

$HYPE  , On-chain analysis shows wallets tied to a former #Hyperliquid  employee sold a majority of #HYPE  holdings, triggering a rapid sell-off that inflicted losses on some ex-employees and retail holders. Hyperliquid has publicly distanced itself, saying the trades were personal, not company-directed, and that it is reviewing the matter as   https://transscreen.ru/en/CMK_news28464 markets normalize.  #Macro Insights#

Hyperliquid ( $HYPE) is gaining significant traction today, currently holding a top spot on the CoinMarketCap trending list. This interest follows a major $12.1M whale accumulation and a governance vote for a $1B token burn proposal, which aims to optimize supply metrics.
‚ÄãFrom a technical perspective, $HYPE is navigating a consolidation phase with immediate support found between $21 and $23. Momentum has seen a slight uptick as 24-hour volume rose by over 40%, though the price structure remains sensitive after recently retracing from its previous local highs.
